attributes.action: This petition is to request that Parliament respect the EU referendum result.
attributes.additional_details: This petition is to request that Parliament uphold the referendum result and to provide a balanced view of public opinion. It is also a social experiment to see, in the event that this petition reaches 2m signatures, whether it will get the same media coverage.
attributes.background: There is a petition calling on Parliament to revoke Article 50 to prove "the strength of public support" for remaining in the EU. Are there an equivalent 2.5m+ signatures in favour of leaving the EU.
